ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix

cookingTips: Shred green tomatoes finely so they cook down quickly and create a smooth jam texture
Bring the mixture to a rolling boil and maintain a vigorous boil while stirring often to avoid sticking
The Jell-O mix provides both flavor and pectin; add it near the end and stir in completely before testing for doneness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user to recognize the gel stage by dropping a spoonful on a cool plate and checking for wrinkles when pushed. Canning safety is important.
